titles.title: HP532 Lord Christ, we praise your sacrifice

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Once helpless in your mother's arms,
Dependant on her mercy then,
You made yourself again, by choice,
As helpless in the hands of men;
And, at their mercy crucified
You claimed your victory and died.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Though helpless and rejected then,
You reign as living Lord acclaimed;
For ever by your victory
Is God's eternal love proclaimed
The love which goes through death to find
New life and hope for humankind.

verse.name: v4
